price: 74. Haddaanan kugu sugin (Xaqa) waxaad ku sigatay inaad u iilato xaggooda wax yar.
arabic: وَلَوۡلَآ أَن ثَبَّتۡنَٰكَ لَقَدۡ كِدتَّ تَرۡكَنُ إِلَيۡهِمۡ شَيۡـٔٗا قَلِيلًا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: walawlā an thabbatnāka laqad kidtta tarkanu ilayhim shayan qalīlan
